Title: We create a new game with the /api/game end-point
We can check the status of the Wordle service by sending a GET to /api/service
This is an example of a complete game played via the API
We make a move by posting a word to the with the /api/game/{id}/word end-point
If we try to ask for the answer by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/answer
We can get the current game result by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/result
At any time we can check the current state of the game by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/history

Story: When a player asks for hints
Title: We can request a hint for the current game via GET /api/game/{id}/hint

Title: Requesting another hint
